problem.p: REST or Query requests are HTTP or HTTPS requests that use an HTTP verb (such as GET or POST) and a parameter named Action or Operation that specifies the API you are calling.
What’s an ECU?
Does AWS Direct Connect allow you access to all Availabilities Zones within a Region?

choicegroup.choice: Depends on the type of connection
Only when there’s just one availability zone in a region. If there are more than one, only one availability zone can be accessed directly.

problem.p: Fill in the blanks: A_____ is a storage device that moves data in sequences of bytes or bits (blocks). Hint: These devices support random access and generally use buffered I/O.
What does Amazon EBS stand for?
Within the IAM service a GROUP is regarded as a:

choicegroup.choice: It’s the group of EC2 machines that gain the permissions specified in the GROUP.
There’s no GROUP in IAM, but only USERS and RESOURCES.

problem.p: How many types of block devices does Amazon EC2 support?
To help you manage your Amazon EC2 instances, images, and other Amazon EC2 resources, you can assign your own metadata to each resource in the form of____________
Can I detach the primary (eth0) network interface when the instance is running or stopped?

choicegroup.choice: Depends on the state of the interface at the time

problem.p: True or False: When you add a rule to a DB security group, you do not need to specify port number or protocol.
Can I initiate a “forced failover” for my Oracle Multi-AZ DB Instance deployment?
A __________ is the concept of allowing (or disallowing) an entity such as a user, group, or role some type of access to one or more resources.
In the Amazon RDS Oracle DB engine, the Database Diagnostic Pack and the Database Tuning Pack are only available with ______________
What does the “Server Side Encryption” option on Amazon S3 provide?

choicegroup.choice: It provides an encrypted virtual disk in the Cloud.
It doesn’t exist for Amazon S3, but only for Amazon EC2.
It encrypts the files that you send to Amazon S3, on the server side.
It allows to upload files using an SSL endpoint, for a secure transfer.

problem.p: What is the charge for the data transfer incurred in replicating data between your primary and standby?

choicegroup.choice: Double the standard data transfer charge
Same as the standard data transfer charge
Half of the standard data transfer charge

problem.p: The Amazon EC2 web service can be accessed using the _____ web services messaging protocol. This interface is described by a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.
Amazon EC2 provides a repository of public data sets that can be seamlessly integrated into AWS cloud-based applications.What is the monthly charge for using the public data sets?

choicegroup.choice: A 1 time charge of 10$ for all the datasets.
10$ per month for all the datasets
There is no charge for using the public data sets

problem.p: Amazon RDS creates an SSL certificate and installs the certificate on the DB Instance when Amazon RDS provisions the instance. These certificates are signed by a certificate authority. The _____ is stored athttps://rds.amazonaws.com/doc/rds-ssl-ca-cert.pem.
HTTP Query-based requests are HTTP requests that use the HTTP verb GET or POST and a Query parameter named_____________.
Do the system resources on the Micro instance meet the recommended configuration for Oracle?

choicegroup.choice: Yes but only for certain situations

problem.p: When you resize the Amazon RDS DB instance, Amazon RDS will perform the upgrade during the next maintenance window. If you want the upgrade to be performed now, rather than waiting for the maintenance window, specify the _____ option.
Without _____, you must either create multiple AWS accounts-each with its own billing and subscriptions to AWS products-or your employees must share the security credentials of a single AWS account.
What is the name of licensing model in which I can use your existing Oracle Database licenses to run Oracle deployments on Amazon RDS?
Amazon RDS supports SOAP only through __________.

____________ embodies the “share-nothing” architecture and essentially involves breaking a large database into several smaller databases. Common ways to split a database include 1) splitting tables that are not joined in the same query onto different hosts or 2) duplicating a table across multiple hosts and then using a hashing algorithm to determine which host receives a given update.
Does Amazon Route 53 support NS Records?

choicegroup.choice: Yes, it supports Name Service records.
Yes, it supports Name Server records.

problem.p: When using consolidated billing there are two account types. What are they?
The SQL Server _____ feature is an efficient means of copying data from a source database to your DB Instance. It writes the data that you specify to a data file, such as an ASCII file.
A __________ is a document that provides a formal statement of one or more permissions.
Will I be charged if the DB instance is idle?
